ygData.subject: Re: enchanter only items
ygData.msgSnippet: or you could give me the URL since i am at work, and dont have it bookmarked here hehe. ... From: Greg Short  To:
ygData.messageBody:
or you could give me the URL since i am at work, and dont have it bookmarked
here hehe.

----- Original Message -----
From: Greg Short <eq@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 12, 1999 12:12 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] enchanter only items


> From: "Greg Short" <eq@...>
>
> Have a sense of adventure and discover it yourself = )
>
> Or if you paid attention to the web-board on my site it has the complete
> info and has done for a few days.
>
> - Baelish
>
